name: Go Away, Zeus!
description:
Zeus is shapeshifting into animals to seduce your wife! Stop him by finding out which animal he has turned into. Can you protect your wife for a month? 

Controls: Left mouse click to shoot arrows. 

Zeus has behavior patterns that make him stand out from normal animals. 

Hint 1: Zeus might be able to shapeshift, but he cannot copy animal voices/cries. 

Hint 2: Every time you blink, Zeus moves closer to your wife. Be fast! 

Also, don't shoot innocent animals! (unless you set difficulty to Easy) 

Made with Unity & Visual Studio. 
Clip Studio Paint was used for "art", Audacity for "sound".
